description: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.16% magic resistance, 0.32 armor, 2 attack speed, 0.1% movement speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen, 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.16% magic resistance, 0.32 armor, 2 attack speed, 0.1% movement speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen, 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.16% magic resistance, 0.32 armor, 2 attack speed, 0.1% movement speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen, 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
